description: Not to good at talking about myself but here it goes. I have many interests both recreational and as a result of my work. I enjoy a good night out amongst other things but also happy with a bottle of red wine and a good film. I like the countryside for walks and camping and used to travel quite a bit. From my work, I do have a keen interest in the internet and science. Signing up here as I would like to meet someone who I can click with on several levels and then take it from there.
